instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.A1278: What is A1278? A1278 is a model number for a 13 inch size MacBook or Macbook Pro Unibody from years Late 2008, Mid 2009, Mid 2010, Early 2011, Late 2011, Mid 2012 with EMC 2254, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-2327, 820-2530, 820-2879, 820-2936, 820-3115..
definitions.PPBUS_G3H: What is PPBUS_G3H? Main system power rail that charges the battery, or is power from the battery, that everything else is powered from. .
definitions.PP3V42_G3H: What is PP3V42_G3H? PP3V42_G3H is a power rail present when the machine is in a G3H global system hardware off state and is the first rail that should be generated in Macbooks that use it. .
definitions.C7050: What is C7050? Capacitor between current sense lines on ISL6259 chip for battery current sensing, you should measure around 2.202 ohms across this. Often when the resistance across this capacitor is higher it is because one of the current sense resistors going to the ISL6259 chip has failed. When current sensing resistors between the shunt resistor and the ISL6259 power IC have failed the ISL6259 cannot gauge how much current is being sent to or drawn from the battery, which will cause the ISL6259 to stop drawing/sending power to the battery as a safety precaution. Symptoms are low voltage on PPBUS_G3H, quarter fan spin, boot looping, or battery not charging..
definitions.C7020: What is C7020? Capacitor between current sense lines on ISL6259 chip for charger current sensing, you should measure around 20.02 ohms across this. Often when the resistance across this capacitor is higher it is because one of the current sense resistors going to the ISL6259 chip has failed. When current sensing resistors between the shunt resistor and the ISL6259 power IC have failed the ISL6259 cannot gauge how much current is being drawn from the charger, which will cause the ISL6259 to stop drawing as much power from the charger as a safety precaution. Symptoms are low voltage on PPBUS_G3H, quarter fan spin, boot looping, or battery not charging..

threads.title: [SOLVED]Macbook pro 13 <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1278</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> Dont turn On
threads.message:
Hi guys,

I have a board 820 2936 b, and when i put the charge i have only a green light.

the problem is <SIGNAL>PPBUS_G3H</SIGNAL>  i have only 3.4v.
<SIGNAL>PP3V42_G3H</SIGNAL> is ok 3.5v. 

i already sitched isl 6259.. i dont no were to look.. any idea ? 

greatings

threads.title: [SOLVED]Macbook pro 13 <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1278</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> Dont turn On
threads.message: Resistance over <CAPACITOR>C7050</CAPACITOR> and <CAPACITOR>C7020</CAPACITOR>??, voltage on pin 2 from ISL??

threads.title: [SOLVED]Macbook pro 13 <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1278</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> Dont turn On
[SOLVED]Macbook pro 13 <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1278</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> Dont turn On
threads.message: Ive said "resistance" over <CAPACITOR>C7020</CAPACITOR> and <CAPACITOR>C7050</CAPACITOR> not voltage... resistance between pin 1 and pin 2 of each capacitor...

threads.title: [SOLVED]Macbook pro 13 <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1278</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> Dont turn On
[SOLVED]Macbook pro 13 <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1278</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> Dont turn On
threads.message: Remove F7040 and check if <SIGNAL>PPBUS_G3H</SIGNAL> goes high (12.6V), if dont, measure in diode mode pin1 from F7040 and report value, also check that isl is soldered correctly..

threads.title: [SOLVED]Macbook pro 13 <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1278</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> Dont turn On
threads.message: pin 1 F7040 have 7.1 mega ohm .. i'm soldering a new one .. ty

threads.title: [SOLVED]Macbook pro 13 <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1278</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> Dont turn On
[SOLVED]Macbook pro 13 <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1278</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> Dont turn On
threads.message: isl bad soldered. i have now 12.8 v but dont turn on yet.. =)

threads.title: [SOLVED]Macbook pro 13 <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1278</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> Dont turn On
threads.message: i found the problem, bad <CAPACITOR>C6221</CAPACITOR>. tank you very much aprendiz
